Lewis Hamilton: 6 Kali Juara Formula 1, Bisa Samai Michael Schumacher
04 Nov 2019, 08:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Mercedes AMG Petronas, Lewis Hamilton, sukses besar meraih gelar dunianya yang keenam usai finis kedua dalam balapan Formula 1 GP Austin, Texas, Amerika Serikat, yang digelar di Circuit of The Americas (COTA) pada Minggu (3/11/2019) waktu setempat, atau Senin (4/11/2019) pagi WIB.
Untuk mengunci gelar kali ini, Hamilton hanya butuh tambahan empat poin demi mengalahkan sang tandem, Valtteri Bottas, dan misi ini berhasil ketika Bottas memenangi balapan, sementara ia finis kedua. Ini kedua kalinya Hamilton mengunci gelar di COTA, mengingat sebelumnya ia melakukan hal serupa pada 2015.
Gelar Hamilton ini juga sangat berarti bagi Mercedes, yang kini menjadi tim pertama dalam sejarah yang mampu meraih gelar dunia pebalap dan konstruktor selama enam musim beruntun. Jika gelar pebalap dikunci Hamilton di COTA, gelar konstruktor sudah dikunci Mercedes di Suzuka, Jepang, beberapa pekan lalu.

Lewis Hamilton: 6 times Champion Formula 1, Can Match Michael Schumacher
Nov 04 2019, 08:33 by Bola.net
FIFA.com - Mercedes AMG Petronas racer, Lewis Hamilton, had a huge success reaching his sixth world title after finishing second in the Formula 1 GP race Austin, Texas, United States, which was held at the Circuit of The Americas (COTA) on Sunday (3/11) / 2019) local time, or Monday (11/04/2019) morning WIB.
To seal the title this time, Hamilton only needed an additional four points to defeat the tandem, Valtteri Bottas, and this mission was successful when Bottas won the race, while he finished second. This is the second time Hamilton has locked the title at COTA, considering that he did the same thing in 2015.
The Hamilton title is also very meaningful for Mercedes, who is now the first team in history to be able to win the world title of racer and constructor for six consecutive seasons. If Hamilton's title is locked by Hamilton in COTA, the constructor's title has been locked by Mercedes in Suzuka, Japan, a few weeks ago.
